duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish positive and trusting rapport with clients and create individualized treatment plans according to patient needs and circumstances.
Provide counseling, treatment, and ongoing assessments of patient progress.
Maintain frequent and close working relationships with program staff and facility team members throughout the organization.
Initiate and maintain strong professional relationships with clients and families, clinical providers, referral partners, and vendors.
Conduct weekly individual therapy and group therapy for each client.
Monitor behavioral interventions for each client and provide skills coaching as needed.
Provide case management and social services for each client.
Record all contacts in progress notes and complete all required reports for each client.
Provide regular updates via phone to collateral contacts (family members, referents, etc.).
Assist with crisis intervention and special activities as needed.
Collaborate with Clinical Director and Insurance Coordinator for decisions regarding level of care for insurance clients.
Implement all organization rules, policies, and guidelines consistently.
Maintain professional boundaries with clients at all times.
Consult with psychiatrist as needed and provide consultation to milieu staff.
Attend relevant trainings, including in-services, and meet regularly with supervisor(s) to evaluate each client.
Perform all other duties as necessary for the good of the agency as instructed by supervisor.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Social Work, Marriage and Family Therapy or Psychology, California license eligible
At least one year experience working with clients with substance abuse and/or borderline personality disorder
Certification or significant experience in providing Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT)

Valid California Driver's License and insurability by agency's automobile insurance carrier, clearance of TB test, fingerprinting, and state clearance, and any other mandatory state/federal requirements
